full_summary:
# Offsetting Work - Shippagan Gully, New Brunswick

## Solicitation Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number (Numéro de consultation) | WS3866521253 |
| Reference Number (Numéro de référence) | DS3866578707 |
| Publication Date (Date de publication) | 2023-02-10 |
| Tender Closing Date (Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres) | 2023-02-28T14:00:00 |
| Contracting Entity (Entité de services du gouvernement) | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| End User (Utilisateur final) | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |

## Work Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada has a requirement for offsetting work at the Shippagan Gully in New Brunswick. The scope of work includes:

* Removal of shore protection works on the east side of the Shippagan Gully
* Construction of a marsh sill
* Removal of access road

All work shall be performed in accordance with the plans and specifications for PWGSC Project Number R.076592.005.

## Tendering Procedure

* The tendering procedure is open to all interested suppliers
* The selection criterion is lowest price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of opportunity: None

## Important Dates

* Tender closing date: 2023-02-28T14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: None
